justification: The phrase 'building connections' is directly tied to body language's role.

qualifiers.CausalHint: to establishing rapport and building connections

evidence_excerpt: From conveying emotions and intentions to establishing rapport and building connections, body language plays a crucial role...
canonical_rel_desc: The subject facilitates the formation or strengthening of the object, typically a social bond or interpersonal connection, without being the sole or strictly deterministic cause.

rel_desc: Facial expressions are a component or cue type of body language.
resolution_context: Standard modeling: specific nonverbal channel as part of the broader body language construct.
justification: The text groups facial expressions with gestures and posture as cues read for body language.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: MentionedAs: subtle cues of body language

evidence_excerpt: By paying attention to the subtle cues of facial expressions, gestures, and posture, individuals can enhance their communication skills...
canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a more specific subtype, category, or form within the broader category represented by the object.

rel_desc: The art of body language is the skillful, mastered use of body language.
resolution_context: Treating 'art of body language' as a skillful subset/expertise in body language.
justification: Phrase indicates a skilled, artistic application of general body language.
evidence_excerpt: Ultimately, mastering the art of body language can lead to more meaningful and fulfilling interactions with others.
canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a more specific type or modality within the broader class represented by the object.
